title: Budweiser Font
content: I was wondering if anyone can tell me what kind of font that is used to make the Budweiser logo found on their website. I included a graphic to show what I'm talking about ![Budweiser Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150324002817im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/34284.gif)
author: brewskieman21

comments.content: This was already a target to the typophile, in here: [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/32382.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150324002817/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/32382.html)
I know, but that didn't help me out that well so I was hoping someone else would see this and give a different answer. Thanks though for pointing that out.
